moderator_approved_title: Congratulations! Your Moderator Application Has Been Approved!
moderator_approved_greeting: We're thrilled to inform you that your application to become a moderator for the following tag has been approved:
moderator_approved_description: You now have moderation privileges for this tag. As a moderator, you'll help manage content and maintain community quality.
moderator_permission_1: Set tag visuals: logo, banner, description
moderator_permission_2: Manage tag settings: related characters, NSFW allowances
moderator_encourage_1: Well-crafted, visually appealing content - Thoughtfully created posts with attention to detail
moderator_encourage_2: Fandom creations - Content celebrating your favorite fandoms and interests
moderator_encourage_3: Original creations - Your unique characters, artwork, stories, and innovative content
moderator_encourage_4: Community engagement - Meaningful interactions and constructive discussions
moderator_discourage_1: Inappropriate content - Any material that violates our community standards
moderator_discourage_2: Off-topic posts - Content unrelated to the tag's purpose and theme, or unrelated to OC/anime/fandom in general
moderator_discourage_3: AI-generated content from other AI tools - Materials created using other AI tools shouldn't be posted on KomikoAI
moderator_discourage_4: Low-effort submissions - Content lacking originality or meaningful value
moderator_connect_description: We'd love to welcome you properly and answer any questions you might have about your new role. Please book a time that works for you to meet our team via Zoom (if you are interested):
moderator_thank_you: We're excited to have you join our moderation team and look forward to working together to build a wonderful community!
